note: To allow comparisons between countries and over time this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Share with alcohol or drug use disorders, men vs. women
subtitle: Alcohol or drug use dependence is defined by the International Classification of Diseases as the presence of three or more indicators of dependence for at least a month within the previous year. Tobacco smoking is not included.

display.name: Share of men with alcohol or drug use disorders
Share of women with alcohol or drug use disorders
